com.scs.gmc

Class ConnectorMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scs.gmc.ConnectorMain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ConnectorMain
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The main class for enabling communication between the GMC server and the game.

    • Field Detail

      • players

        public final java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,ClientPlayerData> players

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConnectorMain

        public ConnectorMain(IGameClient _client,
                     java.lang.String _server,
                     int _port,
                     java.lang.String _playername,
                     java.lang.String _gameid,
                     int _min_players,
                     int _max_players)
        Create an instance of the ConnectorMain.
        Parameters:
        _client - The client that wants to be notified of events.
        _server - The IP address of the server running the GMC server software to connect to.
        _port - The port to connect to
        _playername - Our name as it will be sent to other players.
        _gameid - A unique code identifying this game. Players will be joined to other players with the same code.
        _min_players - The number of players required before the players are notified that the game has started.
        _max_players - The maximum number of players to accept in the game.

      • ConnectorMain

                     java.lang.String _server,
                     int _port,

                     java.lang.String _gameid,
                     int _min_players)

      • sendOutOfGame

        public void sendOutOfGame()
        Tell the server that we are out of the game, e.g. we have died and run out of lives.

      • sendIAmTheWinner

        public void sendIAmTheWinner()
        Tell the server that we are probably the winners as we have reached the end. Note that the server will confirm this or otherwise, as multiple clients could send this at the same time.

      • areWeTheWinner

        public boolean areWeTheWinner()
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating if we were the winner in the last game.

      • waitForStage

        public void waitForStage(ConnectorMain.GameStage stage)
        Wait for the game to finish. Typically called if we've told the server that we're the winner or that we're out of the game.
